figyberry.desc: Restores 1/2 max HP at 1/4 max HP or less; confuses if -Atk Nature. Single use.

wikiberry.desc: Restores 1/2 max HP at 1/4 max HP or less; confuses if -SpA Nature. Single use.

magoberry.desc: Restores 1/2 max HP at 1/4 max HP or less; confuses if -Spe Nature. Single use.

aguavberry.desc: Restores 1/2 max HP at 1/4 max HP or less; confuses if -SpD Nature. Single use.

iapapaberry.desc: Restores 1/2 max HP at 1/4 max HP or less; confuses if -Def Nature. Single use.

souldew.desc: If held by a Latias/Latios, its Dragon- and Psychic-type moves have 1.2x power.

lightclay.desc: Holder's use of Aurora Veil, Light Screen, or Reflect lasts 8 turns instead of 5.

bigroot.desc: Holder gains 1.3x HP from draining/Aqua Ring/Ingrain/Leech Seed/Strength Sap.

normaliumz.name: Normalium Z

pikaniumz.desc: If held by a Pikachu with Volt Tackle, it can use Catastropika.

decidiumz.name: Decidium Z
decidiumz.desc: If held by a Decidueye with Spirit Shackle, it can use Sinister Arrow Raid.

inciniumz.name: Incinium Z
inciniumz.desc: If held by an Incineroar with Darkest Lariat, it can use Malicious Moonsault.

primariumz.name: Primarium Z
primariumz.desc: If held by a Primarina with Sparkling Aria, it can use Oceanic Operetta.

tapuniumz.name: Tapunium Z
tapuniumz.desc: If held by a Tapu with Nature's Madness, it can use Guardian of Alola.

marshadiumz.name: Marshadium Z
marshadiumz.desc: If held by Marshadow with Spectral Thief, it can use Soul-Stealing 7-Star Strike.

aloraichiumz.name: Aloraichium Z
aloraichiumz.desc: If held by an Alolan Raichu with Thunderbolt, it can use Stoked Sparksurfer.

snorliumz.name: Snorlium Z

mewniumz.name: Mewnium Z

pikashuniumz.name: Pikashunium Z
pikashuniumz.desc: If held by cap Pikachu with Thunderbolt, it can use 10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt.

adrenalineorb.name: Adrenaline Orb
adrenalineorb.desc: Raises holder's Speed by 1 stage if it gets affected by Intimidate. Single use.

icestone.name: Ice Stone
icestone.shortDesc: Evolves certain species of Pokemon when used.
icestone.desc: Evolves Alolan Sandshrew into Alolan Sandslash and Alolan Vulpix into Alolan Ninetales when used.

beastball.name: Beast Ball
beastball.desc: A special Poke Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts.

terrainextender.name: Terrain Extender
terrainextender.desc: Holder's use of Electric/Grassy/Misty/Psychic Terrain lasts 8 turns instead of 5.

protectivepads.name: Protective Pads
protectivepads.desc: Holder's moves are protected from adverse contact effects, except Pickpocket.

electricseed.name: Electric Seed
electricseed.desc: If the terrain is Electric Terrain, raises holder's Defense by 1 stage. Single use.

psychicseed.name: Psychic Seed
psychicseed.desc: If the terrain is Psychic Terrain, raises holder's Sp. Def by 1 stage. Single use.

mistyseed.name: Misty Seed
mistyseed.desc: If the terrain is Misty Terrain, raises holder's Sp. Def by 1 stage. Single use.

grassyseed.name: Grassy Seed
grassyseed.desc: If the terrain is Grassy Terrain, raises holder's Defense by 1 stage. Single use.

lunaliumz.name: Lunalium Z
lunaliumz.desc: Lunala or Dawn Wings Necrozma with Moongeist Beam can use a special Z-Move.

ultranecroziumz.name: Ultranecrozium Z
ultranecroziumz.desc: Dusk Mane/Dawn Wings Necrozma: Ultra Burst, then Z-Move w/ Photon Geyser.

mimikiumz.name: Mimikium Z
mimikiumz.desc: If held by a Mimikyu with Play Rough, it can use Let's Snuggle Forever.

lycaniumz.name: Lycanium Z

kommoniumz.name: Kommonium Z
